mapper.select: select sr.business_id, sr.name, sr.code from sys_user_role sur left join sys_role sr on sr.business_id = sur.role_id where sur.user_id = #{userId}
select t_access.* from sys_role_access t_role_access left join sys_access t_access on t_access.business_id = t_role_access.access_id where t_role_access.role_id = #{business_id}

select *, t_user_update.username as updateBy, t_user_create.username as createBy from SYS_ROLE t_role left join SYS_USER t_user_update on t_role.update_by = t_user_update.business_id left join SYS_USER t_user_create on t_role.create_by = t_user_create.business_id
where t_role.name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or t_role.code like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by t_role.create_time desc
